fields.title: Market Research is About Planning
fields.description: Doing your Market Research is a hard but important part of  your journey. In the next few questions you will complete a market research report that will go to your advisor.

fields.title: Important Market Research Links.
fields.description:
Here are some Useful Market Research Links to Help you get Started:
  • United States Census Bureau
  • Statistics Canada
  • Canada Industry Trends
